Text: Mirage (Fleetwood Mac album):  "Mirage" yielded several hit singles: "Hold Me" (which peaked at #4 on the US "Billboard" Pop Chart, remaining there for seven weeks), "Gypsy" (#12 US Pop Chart), "Love in Store" (#22 US Pop Chart), "Oh Diane" (which reached #9 in the UK), and "Can't Go Back" (issued on 7" and 12" in the UK).
